meanings.definition: A person who eats or consumes food greedily or voraciously.
meanings.sent1: The guttler at the party finished all the snacks in no time.
meanings.sent2: My little brother is a guttler when it comes to chocolate.
meanings.sent3: The guttler in the movie made everyone laugh with his huge appetite.
meanings.sent4: Her love for food turned her into a guttler at the buffet.
meanings.sent5: The guttler's table was always full of empty plates and satisfied smiles.

meanings.definition: To eat or consume food greedily or voraciously.
meanings.sent1: I watched the raccoon guttler through the trash for leftovers.
meanings.sent2: After the hike, we all guttlered the delicious sandwiches in minutes.
meanings.sent3: The kids guttlered the candy so fast that they got a stomach ache.
meanings.sent4: The team guttlered the pizza after the game, celebrating their win.
meanings.sent5: She guttlered the popcorn during the movie, not leaving a single kernel behind.
